long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shit will be shit. This Firefox Add-on literally turns posts of infamous blacklisted DUIC shitposters into shit.

DUIC is a local news site based in the city of Utrecht (Netherlands). It is a valuable news source, but is suffers from some infamous shitposters. This Add-on was not made to deny their existence, but just to give some relief in a fun way.
